title: Lag Issues
body: So today I had the worst constant ping experience today averaging about 1-2k Ping along with major lag problems in the past couple of patches to the point it's not safe for me to rank anymore. Because i don't know if it's the problem with my cpu or location because as soon the servers moved to Chicago my ping improved greatly with me playing on 39 avg ping but after some maintenance updates in the past few patches or so Im ping has completely gone off the wall as of late

replies.body: I have had the same issue! Are you on Verizon FiOS also?
But where exactly do I go to because I get lost on specially what category do I enter in to resolve them

Latency issues are largely caused by ISP routing issues to the server and are *very unlikely* to be affected by patches since they only change local files in the League folder. As a first step, I recommend working through our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are good to go.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
